all{html.with-featherlight{overflow:hidden}.featherlight{display:none;position:fixed;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;z-index:2147483647;text-align:center;white-space:nowrap;cursor:pointer;background:#333;background:transparent}.featherlight:last-of-type{background:rgba(0,0,0,0.6)}.featherlight:before{content:'';display:inline-block;height:100%;vertical-align:middle}.featherlight
